definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 25:21 straightness, uprightness;—[[ישֶׁר]] Pr 2:13 + 11 t.; sf. [[יׇשְׁרוֹ]] Job 33:23, Pr 14:2; —
straightness, evenness, of paths (with moral implication) Pr 2:13, Pr 4:11.

rightness, uprightness Pr 17:26; [[תּׂם וׇישֶׁר]] Ps 25:21; of words, spoken Job 6:25, written Ec 12:10; of the moral walk ([[ו]])[[בישׁר]] 1Ki 9:4, Pr 14:2; [[ישֶׁר־לִבִּי]] Job 33:3; [[ישׁר לבב]] De 9:5, Ps 119:7, 1Ch 29:17:—on Ps 111:8 v. [[יׇשָׁר]]
what is due, right Job 33:23, Pr 11:24.
